title: Asian Ethnology
additional-notes: This journal was published as Folklore Studies from 1942 to 1962, and as Asian Folklore Studies from 1963 to 2007, before adopting its current name in 2008.

Issues prior to the change to the current name were published in China and Japan. Their contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
